title: Nidalee Jungle masteries?
body: I usually run Brute force and Martial, with Executioners and the AP +6 mastery and then take 1 point in spell blade and 1 in %pen. Not sure if anyone has any tips or anything though because I feel like I could be doing something wrong, even though I usually have good success with her in the Jungle with AD marks, AP Glyphs and Quints and Armor seals.

replies.body:
The mastery page i have for nid jungle is basically copied from what the pros have but slightly changed for myself, but is still close enough.

http://i.imgur.com/0iFVew1.png

Ah K. Maybe I should take the two minion masteries instead of spell blade and 1 point in the % AP boost since her clear is sorta weak early and she lacks sustain. 10 AP per 1000 and 5% of your 300ish AP isn't a lot of damage to be missing out on.
